rss.description: Maarten Steenhagen is a philosopher and writer. This is his website. You will find notes, essays, and academic papers.
rss.dc:creator: John Doe

item.title: Fictional Creations
item.description: Many people assume that fictional entities are encapsulated in the world of fiction. I show that this cannot be right. Some works of fiction tell us about pieces of poetry, music, or theatre written by fictional characters. Such creations are fictional creations, as I will call them. Their authors do not exist. But that does not take away that we can perform, recite, or otherwise generate actual instances of such works.
